review.title: “Owner operated company”
review.pros: Pros – Pleasant work environment. Able to telecommute when needed. good Salary with bonus potential dependent on customer base. Always working toward meeting customers needs.
review.cons: Cons – Growth potential reliant on each individual. Sales calls required in order to advance. Occasional weekends and needed to telecommute during vacations.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
